flavorText: As the hand closed, there was first terror, then numbness, and finally nothingness.

foreignData.flavorText: Als sich die Hand schloss, war da zuerst Todesangst, gefolgt von Taubheit, und letztendlich nur noch das Nichts.
foreignData.name: Griff der Verödung
foreignData.text: Fahl (Diese Karte hat keine Farbe.)Schicke eine Kreatur deiner Wahl und ein Land deiner Wahl ins Exil.

foreignData.flavorText: A medida que la mano se cerraba, hubo terror, adormecimiento, y, por fin, la nada.
foreignData.name: Yugo de la desolación
foreignData.text: Vacío. (Esta carta no tiene ningún color.)Exilia la criatura objetivo y la tierra objetivo.

foreignData.flavorText: Quand le poing se serra, apparut d'abord la terreur, puis la torpeur, et enfin le néant.
foreignData.name: Poigne de la désolation
foreignData.text: Carence (Cette carte n'a pas de couleur.)Exilez la créature ciblée et le terrain ciblé.

foreignData.flavorText: Quando la mano si chiuse, prima venne il terrore, poi il torpore, infine il nulla.
foreignData.name: Morsa della Desolazione
foreignData.text: Vacuità (Questa carta non ha colore.)Esilia una creatura bersaglio e una terra bersaglio.

foreignData.flavorText: その手が閉じると、初めは恐怖を感じたが、すぐに何も感じなくなり、最後は無になった。
foreignData.name: 荒廃の一掴み
foreignData.text: 欠色（このカードは無色である。）クリーチャー１体と土地１つを対象とし、それらを追放する。

foreignData.flavorText: 그 손을 움켜쥐자 처음에는 공포가, 그 다음에는 무감각이 엄습했고, 마침내는 아무것도 남지 않게 되었다.
foreignData.name: 고적한 움켜쥠
foreignData.text: 결여 (이 카드는 무색이다.)생물과 대지를 각각 목표로 정한다. 그 목표들을 추방한다.

foreignData.flavorText: Quando a mão se fechou, a princípio houve terror, depois torpor e por fim o nada.
foreignData.name: Garras da Desolação
foreignData.text: Desprovido (Este card não tem cor.)Exile a criatura alvo e o terreno alvo.

foreignData.flavorText: Рука сжалась, и после этого был ужас, за ним онемение, а потом — небытие.
foreignData.name: Хватка Разорения
foreignData.text: Лишение (У этой карты нет цвета.)Изгоните целевое существо и целевую землю.

foreignData.flavorText: 巨拳渐握，先是恐惧，进而麻痹，最后便是空无。
foreignData.name: 荒芜之攫
foreignData.text: 虚色（此牌没有颜色。）放逐目标生物与目标地。

foreignData.flavorText: 巨拳漸握，先是恐懼，進而麻痺，最後便是空無。
foreignData.name: 荒蕪之攫
foreignData.text: 虛色（此牌沒有顏色。）放逐目標生物與目標地。

name: Grip of Desolation
originalText:
Devoid (This card has no color.)
Exile target creature and target land.

rulings.text: Devoid works in all zones, not just on the battlefield.
Other cards and abilities can give a card with devoid color. If that happens, it’s just the new color, not that color and colorless.
You must target a creature and a land in order to cast Grip of Desolation. A permanent that’s both a land and a creature can be chosen for both targets.

Cards with devoid use frames that are variations of the transparent frame traditionally used for Eldrazi. The top part of the card features some color over a background based on the texture of the hedrons that once imprisoned the Eldrazi. This coloration is intended to aid deckbuilding and game play.
A card with devoid is just colorless. It’s not colorless and the colors of mana in its mana cost.
If a card loses devoid, it will still be colorless. This is because effects that change an object’s color (like the one created by devoid) are considered before the object loses devoid.

text:
Devoid (This card has no color.)
